title: Bambam (2004) New Testament (Print) SABDA
description: Bambam translation of the New Testament published in 2004. Bambam (also: Pitu Ulunna Salu) is an Austronesian language of West Sulawesi, Indonesia. It is spoken in the Mambi and Tabang districts of Mamasa Regency.

language.name: Bambam
language.area: West Sulawesi, west Polmas District, Mambi subdistrict, Maloso and Mapilli rivers watershed, into Majene and Mamuju districts.
